title: About Me
intro: I'm a Full Stack Developer who thrives on transforming ideas into functional, elegant digital products.
mission: I aim to bridge the gap between design and engineering, building performant and accessible applications.
tech: My toolbelt includes Vue, React, Laravel, PostgreSQL, Tailwind CSS, and more — always tailored to the project's needs.
beyond: When I'm not coding, I’m exploring design trends, reading tech blogs, or experimenting with motion graphics.
